codeSystems.title: Periods of Life

codeSystems.name: DiagnosticReportSupportingInfoVCodes

codeSystems.name: FHIRDeviceCategory
codeSystems.title: FHIR Device Category
codeSystems.description: The association state of the device.

codeSystems.name: R5-imagingselection-2dgraphictype-for-R4
codeSystems.title: Cross-version VS for R5.ImagingSelection2DGraphicType for use in FHIR R4
codeSystems.description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/imagingselection-2dgraphictype|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R5 to R4.
